title: Fresh Healthy Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Western, Juice bar, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small food stand opposite the food court on the 1st floor of Bawadi mall. Veggie (a few vegan adaptable) choices include oatmeal, fruit & granola parfaits, soup, panini/wraps, crepes, detox juices, smoothies, organic teas. Agave as sweetener upon request.
streetAddress: 1st Floor, Bawadi Mall, Zayed Bin Sultan St
